titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: WAITING TIME ADJUSTMENT REASON - National Codes

stentry.p: Did Not Attend APPOINTMENT: where the ATTENDED OR DID NOT ATTEND is National Code 'Did Not Attend - no advance warning given' or National Code 'PATIENT arrived late and could not be seen'

strow.stentry: Egg harvesting: where a delay is caused for egg harvesting
Clinically urgent treatment of another condition: where a delay is caused for a clinically urgent treating condition

stentry.p: Patient pause: the PATIENT is paused on the ELECTIVE ADMISSION LIST because they have made themselves unavailable for treatment for a specified period (because of family reasons, holidays etc.)
